custom-name: Age of Empires I - CD
files:
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_30_build.rar
- scriptinstall: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/findaoe.sh
- scriptsound: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/soundtrack.bat
- scriptclean: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/clean.sh
- gnusox: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/sox/sox/14.4.2/sox-14.4.2-win32.zip
- mp: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/mplayer-win32/MPlayer%20and%20MEncoder/r38135%2Bgb272d5b9b6/MPlayer-generic-r38135%2Bgb272d5b9b6.7z
- grepbin: http://downloads.sourceforge.net/gnuwin32/grep-2.5.4-bin.zip
- grepdep: http://downloads.sourceforge.net/gnuwin32/grep-2.5.4-dep.zip
- updt: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/aoe1_update_1.0c_multi.zip
- menu: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/aoe1.bat
game:
  args: c:\\aoe1.bat
  exe: drive_c/windows/syswow64/wineconsole.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: icodecs
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directplay
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: winxp
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: empires.ico
- chmodx: scriptinstall
- execute:
    args: $DISC
    file: scriptinstall
- task:
    args: /desktop=AOEI,1024x780 $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/aoeinstall.bat
    description: Installing Age of Empires I...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/explorer.exe
    include_processes: explorer.exe
    name: wineexec
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: dxwnd
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        cdvol0: 0
        cdvol1: 64
        cdvol2: 64
        codepage0: 0
        codepage1: 0
        codepage2: 0
        commitaddress0: 0
        commitaddress1: 0
        commitaddress2: 0
        commitlength0: 0
        commitlength1: 0
        commitlength2: 0
        coord0: 3
        coord1: 3
        coord2: 3
        country0: 0
        country1: 0
        country2: 0
        dflag0: 0
        dflag1: 0
        dflag2: 0
        dflagb0: 0
        dflagb1: 0
        dflagb2: 0
        expert: 1
        fakec0: None
        faked0: None
        filterid0: 0
        filterid1: 0
        filterid2: 0
        flag0: 673185825
        flag1: 673194017
        flag2: 673194017
        flagg0: 1207959568
        flagg1: 1207959568
        flagg2: 1207959568
        flagh0: 22
        flagh1: 22
        flagh2: 22
        flagi0: 138444804
        flagi1: 138444804
        flagi2: 138444804
        flagj0: 4224
        flagj1: 4224
        flagj2: 4224
        flagk0: 65536
        flagk1: 65536
        flagk2: 65536
        flagl0: 1114112
        flagl1: 0
        flagl2: 0
        flagm0: 65536
        flagm1: 65536
        flagm2: 65536
        flagn0: 17825796
        flagn1: 17825796
        flagn2: 17825796
        flago0: 0
        flago1: 0
        flago2: 0
        flagp0: 8192
        flagp1: 8192
        flagp2: 8192
        flagq0: 0
        flagq1: 0
        flagq2: 0
        icon0: 
        icon1: 
        icon2: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresh1: 600
        initresh2: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initresw1: 800
        initresw2: 800
        initts0: 0
        initts1: 0
        initts2: 0
        initx0: 0
        inity0: 0
        lang0: 0
        lang1: 0
        lang2: 0
        launchpath0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\empires.exe
        launchpath1: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\empiresx1a.exe
        launchpath2: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\empiresx.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxddinterface1: 7
        maxddinterface2: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxfps1: 0
        maxfps2: 0
        maxres0: -1
        maxres1: -1
        maxres2: -1
        maxx0: 0
        maxy0: 0
        minx0: 0
        miny0: 0
        module0: None
        monitorid0: -1
        monitorid1: -1
        monitorid2: -1
        notes0: None
        opengllib0: None
        path0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\empires.exe
        path1: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\empiresx1a.exe
        path2: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\empiresx.exe
        posx0: 50
        posx1: 50
        posx2: 50
        posy0: 50
        posy1: 50
        posy2: 50
        registry0: None
        renderer0: 7
        renderer1: 7
        renderer2: 7
        scanline0: 0
        scanline1: 0
        scanline2: 0
        sizx0: 800
        sizx1: 800
        sizx2: 800
        sizy0: 600
        sizy1: 600
        sizy2: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        slowratio1: 2
        slowratio2: 2
        startfolder0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\
        startfolder1: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\
        startfolder2: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\
        swapeffect0: 0
        swapeffect1: 0
        swapeffect2: 0
        tflag0: 0
        tflag1: 0
        tflag2: 0
        title0: Age of Empires I
        title1: Age of Empires - Rise of Rome
        title2: Age of Empires - Rise of Rome Upatch HD
        ver0: 0
        ver1: 0
        ver2: 0
        winver0: 0
        winver1: 0
        winver2: 0
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/
    file: grepbin
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/
    file: grepdep
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/
    file: updt
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/mplayer/
    file: mp
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/bin
    file: gnusox
- task:
    executable: scriptsound
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- input_menu:
    description: Please choose AOE I CD language (do not choose another language other
      than your CD's one)
    id: LANG
    options:
    - en: English
    - fr: French
    - ge: German
    - it: italian
    - sp: Spanish
    - po: Portuguese
    preselect: en
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: menu
- chmodx: scriptclean
- execute:
    args: $INPUT_LANG "$DISC" standard
    file: scriptclean
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    app: win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  version: ge-protonified-nofshack-4.9-x86_64
